Package com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MesosEventClient
    Accepts events received from Mesos.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScheduler
    Abstract main scheduler class that ties together the main pieces of a Service.
    DefaultScheduler
    This scheduler when provided with a ServiceSpec will deploy the service and recover from encountered faults when possible.
    ExplicitReconciler
    Synchronizes the service's task state with what Mesos reports, with Mesos as source of truth.
    MesosEventClient.OfferResponse
    Response object to be returned by a call to MesosEventClient#offers(List).
    MesosEventClient.StatusResponse
    Response object to be returned by a call to MesosEventClient#status(org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskStatus).
    MesosEventClient.UnexpectedResourcesResponse
    Response object to be returned by a call to MesosEventClient##getUnexpectedResources(List).
    Metrics
    This class encapsulates the components necessary for tracking Scheduler metrics.
    OfferResources
    Pairs an offer with a collection of resources within that offer that should be destroyed and/or unreserved.
    SchedulerBuilder
    Creates a new DefaultScheduler.
    SchedulerConfig
    This class encapsulates global Scheduler settings retrieved from the environment.
    SchedulerRunner
    Sets up and executes the AbstractScheduler instance.
    SchedulerUtils
    This class provides utilities common to the construction and operation of Mesos Schedulers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MesosEventClient.OfferResponse.Result
    The outcome value to be included in a response object.
    MesosEventClient.StatusResponse.Result
    The outcome value to be included in a response object.
    MesosEventClient.UnexpectedResourcesResponse.Result
    The outcome value to be included in a response object.
